description: Current system focus and priorities - Based on First Principles Analysis

first_principles_insight.diagnosis: 78% of registered users (25/32) never generated a single response

evidence.conclusion: Nobody reaches the limit, so nobody has a reason to pay. +68% more registrations but 0% more active users!

first_principles_insight.strategic_shift: PAUSE lead generation, FOCUS on activating existing users

current_bottleneck.description: 25 registered users have never used the product (78%!)
current_bottleneck.success_metric: Get 10+ users to generate their first response

burst-1.reason: PAUSED - We have 2000 leads, activation is bottleneck

burst-2.reason: PAUSED - Focus on existing users first

burst-3.reason: PAUSED - Social is secondary to activation

burst-7.reason: No users ready to convert yet (0 at limit)

tonight_focus.strategy: Onboarding emails to 29 users who never used product

next_actions: 1. Onboarding emails are now scheduled 3x daily (08:00, 14:00, 20:00 UTC)
2. Monitor activation rate over next 24-48 hours
3. If activation rate increases, users will hit limit

when_to_update: When first user hits 20 response limit
how_agents_use_this: 1. Check if you're in paused_agents before running
2. If priority = 3 and not specifically needed, skip
